helpText: Į_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________š.

generic.title: Į_Error updating categories__________________________š
generic.message: Į_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________š.

maxDepthExceeded.title: Į_Error updating categories__________________________š
maxDepthExceeded.message: Į_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________š.

destinationHasSameName.title: Į_Error updating categories__________________________š
destinationHasSameName.message: Į_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________š.

noSchema.title: Į_Schema not found_________________š
noSchema.message: Į_Item schema not found for user_________________š.

maxCharacter.title: Į_Error updating categories__________________________š
maxCharacter.message: Į_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________š.

deleteInUseCategory.title: Į_Delete category________________š
deleteInUseCategory.message: Į_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________š.

custom.title: Į_Custom categories__________________š
custom.message: Į_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________š.

arcgis.title: Į_ArcGIS categories__________________š
arcgis.message: Į_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________š.

iso.title: Į_ISO categories_______________š
iso.message: Į_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________š.

inspire.title: Į_INSPIRE categories___________________š
inspire.message: Į_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________š.
